C

Character - Class in com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model
This class represents a Character prototype, suitable for use in a Role-Playing Game.
Character() - Constructor for class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.Character
This constructor uses the DiceBag class to randomize the max health and strength of the character at creation.
Character(int, int, int) - Constructor for class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.Character
This constructor allows specific values to be set.
CharacterGame - Class in com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2
This class is the core of the program, it allocates characters into an array on start up then interacts with a user who can select characters (by array index) to run a combat simulation.
CharacterGame() - Constructor for class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.CharacterGame
Initializes the array of character references with a new character for each element within the characters array.
characters - Variable in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.CharacterGame
Array storing references to characters, it is assumed that this array will always be 'full' i.e.

currentHealth - Variable in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.Character
Current health for the character as an integer value.
